meanings.definition: A ball of fire or fiery material.
meanings.sent1: The dragon breathed out hot fireballs.
meanings.sent2: The campfire crackled and sent fireballs into the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dropped a fireball into the soup!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky with colorful fireballs.
meanings.sent5: The volcano erupted, spewing molten fireballs into the air.

meanings.sent1: We stayed up late to watch the shooting stars and fireballs.
meanings.sent2: The fireball streaked across the sky, leaving a trail of light behind.
meanings.sent3: The kids imagined riding on a fireball through space.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a bright fireball lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The fireball blazed through the atmosphere, captivating everyone who saw it.
